title: Email suddenly stopped working
content: my email, redacted@gilanet, stopped coming through at 12 noon. I called the server, gilanet.com and he had me delete the redacted@gilanet.com account and then readd it. It won't let me add the account. It says it can't find the server. They put in a trouble ticket but don't know when they will get back to me.. Any help would be appreciated
creator: shepherdsbunker

title: Claro escuro dentro do email versao android
content: Ter opção de claro escuro dentro do email na versao android como tem na versão desktop windows 11 Certos email de ecomerce nao mostram as imagens, e qdo a opcao de escuro passa para claro (pelo so android) podemos ver as imagens. Na versao windows há 1 botao p inverter a cor claro/escuro no cabeçalho do email.facilitando a visualização individual do email.
creator: marcos.chikasawa

title: vpn error message
content: My thunderbird account quit sending and receiving e-mails today. I called tech support for my e-mail account and spent 1 1/2 hours going through setting. On there end its showing an VPN error message, all VPN's are shut off. I can send and receive on this e-mail account on my iphone and my e-mail account web site just not through thunderbird on my desk top. My accounting program uses thunderbird to send invoice to customers.
creator: 3starplumbing

title: How can the big, blue 'New message' button be displayed again?
content:
I think I clicked the wrong button, but now, the big, blue 'New message' button (and also the 'Load new messages' button) has disappear (please look at the attachment).

I searched in many places, as Appearance settings, "hamburger menu" >> Toolbars, Displaying (in the toolbar), etc., but I found nothing.

Does someone know how to display back these buttons?

Thanks, @eliotttak
creator: eliott3

title: Thunderbird
content: I have an old version of Thunderbird on my former laptop and would like to first export the distribution list an then import the distribution list on my new laptop. How do I do that?
